headline: In Joining Trump’s Team, Starr Switches Roles and Opens Old Wounds
abstract: The independent counsel whose investigation resulted in a Senate trial for President Bill Clinton has joined the team defending President Trump.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The last time a president was on trial, few were more responsible for putting him in the dock than Ken Starr. Now the former independent counsel whose investigation led to President Bill Clinton’s impeachment two decades ago will come to the defense of another president charged with high crimes and misdemeanors.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
